column4:
Includes: 
3' tall x 6' wide double sided Metal Readerboard with 3 rows changable letters (each side) and graphical headers.
Sign mounted on two metal posts with top of sign mounted at 5' above grade
No interior illumination is included or allowed by code.
Code required Landscaping (~20 S.F.) around sign base could be installed by a parent group with materials purchased with project budget.

Exterior display case is 3' tall x 4' wide weathertight aluminum case with a clear anodized finish and a pinnable back surface. Price includes delivery and installation.

Due to existing signs on site the city may not allow the readerboard but are open to reviewing a proposal per my last discussion with them.  I would recommend paying for design and permit documents and waiting to see if city will grant a permit before proceeding with this project.  If they deny a permit there will be no way to add a sign without eliminating an existing sign.

The display case does not require a permit and can be provided regardless.
